[ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_Madness_ChanceOnTurn]% chance to gain Madness every turn.
Madness grants you bonuses and full control.

When Disabled,
incoming damage is reduced by [ExtraData:LLENEMY_ShadowBonus_StunDefense_DamageReduction]%.

When your turn ends,
harmful damage-over-time statuses are cleansed.
